none: United States--Pony Express National Historic Trail

Scale approximately 1:3,000,000. ; Pictorial map.; Shows route of Pony Express with names and location of relay stations along with vignettes of life along the trail at the time including Plains Indians hunting buffalo, forts, wagons, etc.; "Made available through the generous cooperation of the Union Pacific, the first transcontinental railroad, whose lines closely parallel most of the historic Pony Expresss route."

seo.title: Pony express route, April 3, 1860-October 24, 1861 - Map and Atlas Collection
seo.description: Scale approximately 1:3,000,000. ; Pictorial map.; Shows route of Pony Express with names and location of relay stations along with vignettes of life along the trail at the time including Plains Indians hunting buffalo, forts, wagons, etc.; "Made available through the generous cooperation of the Union Pacific, the first transcontinental railroad, whose lines closely parallel most of the historic Pony Expresss route."
